name: whee
content:
whee exclamation
(EXPRESSING HAPPINESS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of happiness: Whee! We got tickets for the game! Moving in to the new apartment! Whee!
More examplesFewer examplesWhee! It arrived!Whee! Another great class! Whee! I'm happy now!

whee exclamation
(EXPRESSING EXCITEMENT)
child's word an expression of excitement when someone or something is moving quickly: Whee! Down the slide we go! Whee! In it goes!
More examplesFewer examplesWhee! There we are. We're right at the bottom of the slide!Whee! Clever boy!One, two, whee!
